Published November 30 2014

$ or Digits

$ or Digits — A look at the psychological effects of including dollar signs ($) on menu prices, based on this Cornell study. Apparently, after we see a dollar sign, “our brain activates a defense mechanism that wants us to keep our money, and thinks about how to get around this expenditure.”

Enjoy your day.
